website_summaries.verdict: Far Cry 3's intelligent and elegant open-world structure balances exciting action with the joys of free-form adventuring, making it one of the best shooters of the year.
pros: A huge tropical world stuffed with fun things to doEcology and unpredictable creatures make the world come aliveStealth and action come together in rewarding waysRole-playing elements and difficulty curve give a sense of momentumGreat structure leads you from one activity to the next
cons: Some design quirks lead to minor frustrationsCertain story elements break the immersion

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of the best games I have ever played. I am a big fan of FPS and this does not disappoint. The story is believable, the graphics are stunning, the gameplay is fun, the guns are awesome, the looting and store fronts are cool, etc. it just has everything I love in a game. It’s like grand theft auto in the jungle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good game even though I got stuck somewhat early on. I like the story line at least. After getting stuck I stopped trying.
customer_reviews.text: Good game. I got stuck somewhat early on during the, "medusa's call" mission. I thought it'd be a great idea to spend all my money on a sniper rifle and ammo then swim around to that junk ship and climb the sail then pick off all the pirates. It turns out that even though they can't shoot you from up there, they can see you and you lose. After getting stuck here I stopped playing. I should have done some side missions to get something other than a sniper rifle and just tried to brute force it but I never got around to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Aged pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Missed this one the first time around but since xb1 has backwards compat, I figured I would give it a shot for the price. And I’m very happy I did, already sucked into the world and love the mechanics in it. Taking outposts is my favorite part and love how all the cars have their own radio stations, nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This game is literally the most awesome game I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: This game is literally the most awesome game I've ever played. I love all the Halo games, the gears of war games, but this takes the cake. Talk about one hell of a ride with you at the driver's seat. This game is an incredible adventure filled with action, suspense, romance, and lots more. I have never played any of the other Far Cry games and this game just happened to be in my recommendations on Amazon. It got rave reviews and it was very cheap so I took a chance and bought it. I have not regretted that decision since. Don't think about it - just do yourself a favor and buy this game!
customer_reviews.author: mdilore

customer_reviews.title: Graphics are pretty dated
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this is so popular, the graphics look like original XBox. This is for a game in it's 3rd version?? The action and game were lacking as well. I stopped playing after awhile, I lost interest.
customer_reviews.author: NOE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have played this game through from start to finish at least three times, and possibly more like four or five. The story and missions kept me interested, but what I enjoyed the most was taking breaks from the story to just wander around the islands and enjoy the beautiful scenery (and shoot bad guys). Far Cry 3 is a masterpiece that I can keep playing over and over again. Don't bother with the multiplayer mode, though. If you go multiplayer, it will be just like every other first person shooter out there. The single-player mode is what makes this game such a joy to play.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: The story is good but the real star of the game is the island. The tasks get repetitive but the terrain and the various animals keep it fresh. I wish that there were interesting setpieces that weren't part of story missions only. You have a lot of fun in some locations then they are rendered unavailable afterwards. I wish there was more hunting in the endgame. I had such a blast with that mechanic that I wore it out early and missed it afterwards. Great fun, a good deal at any price and if the next one is as good as this one I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vance's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Open world shooter with a good sense of progressions
customer_reviews.text: You can read elsewhere about how the game plays, so I'll just list a few of my favorite and least favorite aspects. Likes: Open world Upgradeable weapons Looks nice Story is somewhat coherent I can roam around for a few hours and not be bored Dislikes: Story peaks halfway through the game Progressing through the game actually makes the game easier (outposts get rid of enemies) Relatively low choice of weapons Multiplayer is awful I really wish the co-op followed the single player formula, instead we got a (sometimes literal) rail shooter gallery.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Bass

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out For Vaas...He Will in Enslave Your Arse.
customer_reviews.text: The Far Cry series has always focused on an individual being trapped on an island or tropical region and overcoming their circumstance to survive and thrive there. This game follows that trope but excels because it uses the environment to host multiple facets of gameplay. There is an extensive ecosystem full of animals to hunt, there are bases to conquer, and there is also an interesting plot which work together nicely. Though the story's sense of urgency and the at-your-convenience exploration are at odds, the shooter and stealth assassination gameplay keeps you captivated through the experience. Do not miss this title!
customer_reviews.author: Ogar Ogar

customer_reviews.title: great game, for cheap
customer_reviews.text: This game is basically the same gameplay as assassins creed 3, but with a different story and characters. You can't climb up things in the same way, as your character is not nearly as acrobatic. But it's similar in having to hunt and gather for upgrades. You get new items by climbing a giant tower in the same way. The loot looks the same. Read the details for the items. These guys are funny and quirky. Although, I might just be amused because I am also an animator that just headed down the design path instead of games. Anyway, it's a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Engelkemier

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Game!
customer_reviews.text: The map is HUGE. It's like GTA but done fantastically on an island but done in FPV. They did the First Person view perfectly. I am 30 hours in this game and am still unlocking tons of skills, weapons, etc. I just discovered last playing session I now have a flight suit and parachute on me at all times!!! The blend of stealth and brute force is like the best of Metal Gear Solid and GTA and Call of Duty all wrapped up in one. A true open sandbox world with so much to do, I haven't played another game in months. IMO....This is one of the top 3 games I have ever played on XBOX 360....
customer_reviews.author: Joe Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great story line, awesome gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Challenging and thoroughly fun. Not just a first person slaughter, this game has a great story line that evolves flawlessly. The single player kept me intrigued and I looked forward to playing every night after work. So many challenges and side missions, you will not get bored. Great maps, characters, lots of fun things to do (like zip lining, hunting, cave diving, etc). Easy to follow (I only used online cheats twice and that was because I was lazy) and yet still keeps you motivated. One of my favorite first-player XBOX 360 games for sure. Great replay potential.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda l

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GAME!
customer_reviews.text: I love the beautiful scenery in this game. It's very interactive from animals you gotta watch out for or a gang rolling down the road. You gotta stay of the unbeaten path always and the game really pulls you in to the story. Basically survival of the fittest. You become a warrior not by choice because it's your only way out. So fun with all the message board activities from hunting Cheetahs with a bow to trying to drop a bear with a uzi.... you think it's easy to do but when you unload a full clip on him and he still chases you down...yeah its not. But very fun and I look forward from the next Far Cry game.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fun and addicting game with great storyline
customer_reviews.text: This game is FUN! The story great and I am still playing it. I bought this game when it dropped to $20 and would highly recommend it. It is sorta like Grand Theft Auto where it is an open world game. In other ways it feels like a RPG where you sort of work and build up your life from scratch. The storyline is exciting, just like a movie so you get excited to play the game just to see what happens next. The graphics is great but is worse than Ubisoft's other game like Splinter Cell. Overall this game is fun and addicting game that will keep you busy for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin S

customer_reviews.title: My favorite game of the year
customer_reviews.text: At this point in my life I wouldn't say I'm a hardcore gaming anymore... I was in the past but kids, job, etc and I find myself spending less time behind a controller these days. I tend to stick to FPS because I can play and if life interrupts I can get on with daily life. Then game FarCry3. This game is so amazingly well done that I went through and got every single achievement. The game map is large but there are enough quick travel points that making your way around the map isn't tedious. If you buy one game this year... this should be it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Spoerry

customer_reviews.title: Hours and hours of fun - 4.75 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best videogames I have played. Ever. It takes bits and pieces from all of the best FPS and RPG games. Open world feels like Just cause/GTA. FPS/RPG elements of Bioshock/Skyrim. The story is very well done and engaging. Combat is great, similar to COD or other polished FPS. I think the use of successful mechanics/ideas from other games is really the reason Far Cry 3 is such a great game. So many games try to set themselves apart from their competitors when they could be taking successful elements and incorporating them into their games. Look forward to the next Far Cry and hopefully they add more depth to the hunting/crafting system.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Enough of using the timed scripted tasking bit already!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great game until about half way through you have to do a scripted task that is timed (it was the one where you are trying to protect the guy getting out of the helicopter and getting him to the safety of a boat - I could not complete it - and I could not find a way to just fail it and move on with the game. other than that I have really like the fry cry series
customer_reviews.author: K DavisTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I hate open world games, but....
customer_reviews.text: This was a well thought out game that you can re-play over and over! (No spoiler) To me the ending was VERY lacking!!! Create your own hero was also fun because you can customize the main character to your own liking. Stealthy, guns blazing, animal hunter, and so on are just some of the things you can become. Having a choice is also part of this game because you can decide how to interact with people and they will react accordingly. Do yourself a favor and pick up this game!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Open World, Large Maps provide hours of game play.
customer_reviews.text: If you like open world games like Fall Out, GTA IV, Batman Arkham City, besides the solo missions there are lots of things to explore and do adding to hours of additional game play, more than your moneys worth. A game you'll be playing long after some of the others have fallen off the map. Great 3d Graphics prior to the Xbox 1 or PS4 will be released. Replay value high as there are different ways of solving missions. If you like adventure, exploring, shooter, puzzle solving this game delivers on all accounts.
customer_reviews.author: RPD

customer_reviews.title: Island terror
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Disclaimer, I bought the XBox for my boys and just started playing a bit myself, I'm in my late 40's. So, all these older games are new to me. HOLY COW!! I"ve bought quite a few older games and blown away by the details. This one is loads of fun. What's not like? Rummaging around a beautiful island wasting everybody that crosses my path searching for my lost friends? Only into it for a total of about 3-4 hours and can see that this thing is massive.
customer_reviews.author: MWinAZ

customer_reviews.title: I can play this game for hours
customer_reviews.text: At first, I really did not like this game. The beginning kind of sucks, but after a little while, I just could not stop playing. I literally can play it for hours straight and have trouble turning it off. There are a ton of mini missions and side games so there is so many hours of game play. It is not perfect and there are some annoying quirks about it, but it is just fun. Some things obviously don't make sense like needing to kill an animal to make a wallet so you can hold more money, but just let those go and have fun. The islands themselves are pretty cool looking and some of the hidden canyons are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: bbnugget

customer_reviews.title: Exciting and Intense!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Really fun the first time you go through it. The game has some repeatability to it, but certainly not quite as much as other RPG's I've played in the past (e.g. Skyrim). This game, honestly, is a cross between Call of Duty and Assassin's Creed in my mind. If you can find it for less than $10, you've got a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Schap

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best video game I have ever played. It allows you so much flexibility in the way you can play it. My only criticism would be in all of the Farcry games is the tactic of flanking your enemies is to restrictive for the given terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Action & Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: What can't I love about this game? A hunting mechanic that actually helps you in game in major ways. Lots of cool animals to hunt and enemies to kill. A GREAT villain in the form of Vaas. Lots of guns, explosions, and a story that leaves plenty of room for custom gameplay and character development. Sometimes the textures glitch a little and some of the collectibles are a tad ridiculous, but that's all I can criticize about this game. A MUST BUY for anyone that needs a good action fix.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Birdwhistell

customer_reviews.title: good game, but have to really want to play it
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun and entertaining, but you have to really want to play it to enjoy it. if you are a gamer, you know what I mean by this. the main missions require you to go great distances across what I will say is an impressively beautiful world. but this may take 10 mins just to get to where you need to be, let alone complete the task at hand. I personally did not enjoy the game, but that's just me. it is worth a shot to try it, but for the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of this game so much when my boyfriend bought in for the PS3 that I decided to purchase it for my xbox 360 so I could earn achievement points. There are so many little things to do in the game in addition to the main story that it really makes for a great game. I loved it so much that I didn't trade in my xbox 360 copy when upgrading to the xbox one. Definitely plan to play again in the future and would definitely buy any future releases of this series.
customer_reviews.author: La Reina

customer_reviews.title: If you don't feel like doing a mission right away
customer_reviews.text: Very enjoyable first-person shooter. Been playing it for two days now and i usually don't want to stop. If you don't feel like doing a mission right away, you aren't compelled to. There are a lot of other things to try -- mini games, mini objectives, collectibles to find, and hunting so you can upgrade the gear you are carrying. Just a heads up for some: you are literally playing as if you are seeing out of the main character's eyes which can make those who are prone to motion sickness a little queasy. With that one caveat, i say most people who enjoy these kinds of games will love Far Cry 3.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A. Rom

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This game is decent but not quite what I was hoping for. The offline co op split screen is nice but difficult to see distance on anything under a 50 " screen. I like that you can jump ahead into the next chapter but you cannot go into each part of the chapter like you can with L4D. So if you die you have to go through every checkpoint again. And unlike L4D and similar, you only get the 2 players in split screen, the other 2 players appear in the checkpoint shorts, but are not there to assist during gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this game!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a whim, never played any of the Far Cry games. It lives up to the hype of the IGN reviews. The game is extraordinarily FUN. I just wish there was more to see and do on the island once you're done and everything has been unlocked/explored. Hidden chambers/rooms/secret places. Not a whole lot in that regard. About a day or two before I was finished with the game (finished it throughout one week) I picked up a used copy of FarCry 2. Can't wait to start!
customer_reviews.author: David R. Chase

customer_reviews.title: First game in a LONG time that I REALLY enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: I am just going to state that this one of the best games (for me) that I have ever played. The story, gameplay, graphics, sound, etc are all just first rate. The best part about this game is the HUGE, HUGE environment (sandbox) of islands that you get to play on. I also like how reactive everything is. I am a first person shooter kind of guy and I rarely finish the story, but wow, the story is actually good. So, for the first time in years I am going to finish a VG story. Hopefully, FarCry 4 is in the works.....
customer_reviews.author: BigThrust

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite games of all time. First Person Shooter's Must HAVE.
customer_reviews.text: I would venture to say (and I'm a first person shooter addict) that this is one of the most fun games I've ever played. I haven't even played Farcry 4 yet but I've heard great things. I wanted to play this one first because it also had such high praise, and I know why. It's amazing and I love it enough that I'll probably play it again which I rarely do unless I really love a game.
customer_reviews.author: TheCreatureWalks

customer_reviews.title: Great game - story a bit all over the place
customer_reviews.text: I hope parents look at the rating - it is there for a reason. The game play was awesome - lots of weapons, lots of explosions, lots of different ways to accomplish the same goals. Fun, fun, fun. The tone of the story - however - was all over the place. Some cartoonish cross between Mulder from Xfiles and Stan from American Dad on one hand - and very dark themes on the other. Rollercoaster doesn't even cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Smith

customer_reviews.title: WooHOO
customer_reviews.text: Great game play~! I love the free-roaming world. I only wish that you could restore the pirate outposts and take them again. --------update 3/10/16 So, as pointed out by my 12yo nephew, you CAN restore the outposts after completing the game, and do it all again. Plus, the 'mapbuilder' lets you create a new island to attack or co-op play. Such a fun game
customer_reviews.author: dql

customer_reviews.title: FAR CRY FTW!!
customer_reviews.text: Far Cry has been hit or miss. Far Cry 2 was released with high expectations but it never capitalized. You become overwhelmed and everything becomes redundant the more you play. Far Cry 3 still has some of that redundancy, but it's your choice whether or not you want to pursue. I'm mainly talking about the hunting quests that are optional, although the pay off is great. The story is engaging and the main villain can be very convincing. Great voice acting and mo-cap. Pick this game up if you are a fan of open world games and FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I found myself enjoying this game more than I think I wanted to. The story was interesting and the open world gameplay was strangely addictive. My biggest complaint was the narrative often went off the deep end. Most of the major story intersections removed you from the world and core gameplay elements and thrust you in psychedelic trip scenes that usually left me wonder how whatever just happened actually happened.
customer_reviews.author: James H. C.

customer_reviews.title: Played often
customer_reviews.text: Good game. My husband plays this one all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Beki

customer_reviews.title: Very fun open world shooter
customer_reviews.text: A cool game that investigates some of the same thematic territory as Spec Ops: The Line, but with gameplay that's a lot more fun (though I believe that SOTL's gameplay was intentionally not fun, but that's another discussion all together). Animal skinning, stealth killing, rocket launching, car driving, hang gliding, shark killing fun. Worth every penny I paid for it. Not much replay value though.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Great repeat play
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid FPS game that will have you sitting in front of your TV for hours, days,...months maybe. The single player story is great, and all the characters in it feel like people and not just robots. The townsfolk are a little odd and they feel like robots when you speak to them on side missions. Coop is a fun alternative to play with people, it feels more like COD than the single player campaign. It has linear battles with minimal exploration. Multiplayer is there but it is nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: C. K.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game if you like first-person shooters in an open world
customer_reviews.text: The game is like Grand Theft Auto, but as a first-person shooter and in the jungle. You can either take down enemies silently or head first. Has a variety of weapons and some can have attachments and paints skins. While it is a fun game and an interesting story, I got bored because (like GTA) you don't have to keep on your missions and instead you can run around and do a lot of other things. Which made me a little bored like GTA.
customer_reviews.author: TheUnknownFate

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game! It's kind of realistic in the fact that if you face off against 5 other armed guys you are going to die. So no running and gunning like in Call of Duty. The map is absolutely huge and hang gliding around is very fun. It kind of reminds me of Grand Theft Auto since you can go anywhere, but in GTA you don't have to worry about a tiger jumping out of the bush and eating your face! Great game, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Zee

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the right gamer
customer_reviews.text: I liked the gameplay and the crossover between the style of Assassins Creed and a FPS. I didn't care for the vehicles, they were very difficult to drive and there are multiple occasions where you have to be able to drive well. The fast travel was OK but it is a VERY large map and like I said, driving is tough. The FPS mechanics were OK, I was hoping for more accuracy like COD. I think overall I would rather play Just Cause 2 or Mercs 2.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.text: There is so much to do and so much area to cover. The graphics are incredible and the game play is amazing. I love that you have to craft your own holsters with animal skins and you have to make your own syringes. And thanks God there is no malaria this time (the got very annoying in FC2). I'm not even halfway into the game and I've already done tons of stuff. This is one of those games I look forward to playing. Get it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PandaChris

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a hunting game
customer_reviews.text: Likes: - Several missions to play. - Stealth capabilities. - Cut scenes and story line. Dislikes: - You must hunt, kill and gut many animals to gain rewards in this game. - No improvement from Far Cry 2 on jerkey panning (like when aiming) and jerky driving. - Some weapons seemed better in Far Cry 2. Overall: - If you want a Hunting Game combined with Far Cry 2 and Assins Creed, you'll probably like this. But don't expect super smooth player control.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Decent to pass the time.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up after hearing it compared to a "Skyrim with guns." It's nothing of the kind. It's a mediocre shooter that felt like a cross between a bad Call of Duty and Red Dead Redemption. Great villains made me want to keep playing til I could take care of them, but it's okay to skip this game that sometimes seems to go more for shock value than fun or interesting gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Get this game
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap, this is a fun game! I had seen reviews and gameplay footage (thank you RoosterTeeth), and figured that I'd go ahead and give this game a chance. Probably one of the better games I've ever played, it has a great story line to keep you involved, and exploring this open world is great! The weapons are real fun, and taking over pirate bases is definitely a fun dynamic if you try to do it stealthily. If you're trying to decide whether or not to get this game, stop thinking and just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Happy Joy Joy

customer_reviews.title: Most fun I've had on a game in years
customer_reviews.text: I am a fanatical gamer. I have disposable income and this is where I spend it. I have owned more games in the last 34 years of my life than I would like to admit and this is one of the best I've ever played. Now, it's not a big budget blockbuster with a year's worth of replay but for what it is, it's sooo much fun. If you like first person shooters, sneaking, exploration, side missions and tropical settings, then you neeeed to play this game.
customer_reviews.author: Sheacanbake

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: If you love Action, First Person Shooters and RPG games then definitively You'll love this game. It has a lot of missions and a variety of situations that create a great playing experience. Pros: - Great graphics - Weapon customizations - Vehicles - Good AI - Wild animals around the world makes risky to move on food and create an exciting environment Cons: - Few weapons (two for each category: pistols, sunmachine guns, assault, rifles, sniper) - You cannot save at any point of the game - Unable to hide corpses (as soon as one is detected an alarm is fired)
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Immersive, for better or worse
customer_reviews.text: This game consumed all of my free time for about 2 weeks. Initially, it is a wide-open adventure and lots of exploration can be experienced. As you progress, however, missions switch from optional to mandatory and that is where the fun ended for me. Way too much time "crafting" and finding supplies for the same.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot like Fallout 3 on a tropical island but with play control feeling a bit more visceral like you see in Battlefield 3 (but with no VATS system) ,.,.,. The game is absolutely huge. I will be sinking many more hours into this addicting game. It's one of the best on the market right now... great sound, graphics, characters, weapons, superior level up system, the whole nine yards.
customer_reviews.author: aaron mccormick

customer_reviews.title: I am not an avid gamer, but I do like the pace of this game.
customer_reviews.text: I buy one or two games per year for my 360. Usually I get too frustrated and sell them back to Game Stop. This one, although challenging, is paced at a rate where it keeps me interested. I have not completed the game yet, as I seem to be stuck on a ship fighting pirates. I'll probably have to start over and explore all of the radio towers to collect a sniper rifle...oooops. Spoiler. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: John Treble

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Game of All Time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game on a recommendation from a friend. After playing it for about an hour I realized I couldn't stop playing. Very intriguing story line and enjoyable characters (especially Vaas). The game play is a phenomenal mix of stealth and open world exploration with many RPG elements. This game has become my favorite game of all time with maybe only Skyrim to equal it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Nowell

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I never played any of the other sandbox Ubisoft games like Assassin's Creed. I don't care for games like Skyrim either. However, I decided to pick Far Cry 3 up because it has a FPS aspect to it, and it won tons of awards. I fell in love with the characters, the environment, and all the different things you can do. I really really liked this game. It's full of surprises. The only downside to the game is that I find it has little replay value. I don't play the multiple online, but I did try a co-op mission, which wasn't anything special.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this but it wasn't for me. Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to pick this up when the price dropped to $20 here. I gave it an entire weekend but I couldn't get into it. The graphics, sound, music, controls, intermissions, etc are all great. I really wanted to love this game. Just didn't feel special and got repetitive. I like these kind of adventure shooter type games too as I just played through Tomb Raider, Dishonered, The Last of Us, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Strider Hiryu

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best videogame i have played
customer_reviews.text: This is probably as good as half life 1 and 2. It beats the splinter cell series of games. It is ranked, in my mind, up there with super mario brothers 2 and 3 and River city Ransom and Earth bound and certainly beats ever halo game ever made. Seriously, this thing is a masterpiece. Get ready to say good buy to your social life and hello to a brand new addiction. Oh wow. This thing is
customer_reviews.author: S. Stahr

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: all around great game. amazing graphics, the AI is great, good weapons and even the multiplayer is pretty fun. If this had even half the amount of side quests/missions as skyrim it would be perfect. there just arent very many things to do besides little "games" if you finish the main quest. it just feels like you beat the game too quick. if they were to add more side quests i would give it 5 stars because racing seedoos, throwing knives, playing poker and hunting animals gets pretty old.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but goodie
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, I'm a mid 30s female occasional gamer, this was by far one of the most realistic and fun gaming experiences I had in a long time. I highly recommend this game it was addictive and fulfilling and as challenging as it should have been. I would play it again and again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Team Kue

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put in a category - just awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. I'm not sure if it's an RPG or an FPS, but basically it's both. It has everything I like about RPGs (exploring, quests, leveling, an actual story, etc.) but also has pretty good FPS mechanics. It's not a perfect FPS but the RPG story is fantastic. I played this for a long, long time until I got BF4. I gave this 4 stars because BF4 has to get 5.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Again with the TINY FONTS!!
customer_reviews.text: Yet another game that forces me to play in a widescreen aspect ratio on a 4:3 television and uses those tiny damn fonts. What is the deal?? Is it so hard to make the fonts a little bigger, or to give the option to play the game in a 4:3 aspect ratio?? Nice graphics, but dammit these small fonts games seem to be using more and more are just irritating and suck the fun out.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Far cry 3 is greay
customer_reviews.text: I am not what you call avid NRA am I any good a these these type games, I am more of a sports type game player. I got hooked on this game very quickly. The challenge is definitely there and you come across some scenarios which you think are impossible but then the light switches on and you solve it. The graphics are great and the response is tight. The number of weapons, scenarios will keep you busy for a awhile to complete the first island. Then you have a second island to tackle I highly recommend the game.
customer_reviews.author: K. Oster

customer_reviews.title: The BEST one yet!!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you're a veteran of the series or someone who just wants to start with this game, it fits perfect. I played a little Far Cry 1 and 2 but this one just blows both out of the water. I want to keep it simple and not reveal to much. Just know you're back on an island and relying on survival skills to make it through. (Pretty obvious judging from the cover) Plus, there's SHARKS! Who can beat that? BONUS: If you enjoyed this game make sure you play the 80's spin-off arcade game: Blood Dragon. It is just as fun with an 80's twist thrown in. I hope I helped!
customer_reviews.author: Cody J. Lerch

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my grandson...it's the game he wanted so I'm sure he is happy with it. Price was ok...did see a KMart ad, after I had already received it, in which I could have gotten it for $10 less, but that would have been IF they still had it when I got there, plus a trip in terrible traffic to a crowded store!! I LOVE online shopping, plus I would have paid tax, too, so it really wasn't $10 less, and I didn't have to go out the front door!! I LOVE Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: dminton1350

customer_reviews.title: First Far Cry game
customer_reviews.text: Far Cry 3 was my first Far Cry game. I throughly enjoyed playing it. Once you get the controls down and how the game plays it is a super way to waste some time. The replay value is enjoyable, the enemies are tough but not so tough to put you off the game. I'm keeping this one instead of trading/selling it back to gamestop.
customer_reviews.author: jpstr00

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Gaming Experience
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Amazing Gaming Experience If you are sick and tired of the Call of Duty "run and gun" games or getting yelled at by 12 year olds, this is the 1st person shooter for you. Super realistic with amazing graphics. Every situation you face has multiple solutions and experimentation can lead to some very unexpected outcomes. Hours of entertainment and replay value.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Best game 2012
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying i HATED far cry 2 it was stupid and gave no story worth playing. meet far cry 3 the exact opposite this game gives you a reason to play and creates a real hatred for vaas. The game took me 12 hours to beat but im still playing because the island is really fun. take this advice and thank me later YOUR FRIENDS>CITRA
customer_reviews.author: Tony Galli

customer_reviews.title: and you can't skip certain video parts that for some reason the creators thought the player could not miss out on (I hate that p
customer_reviews.text: Sure this game has it's glitches, and you can't skip certain video parts that for some reason the creators thought the player could not miss out on (I hate that part) but I enjoyed playing the hell out of it. this is probably my second favorite X-Box game, only behind Red Dead Redemption.
customer_reviews.author: J. Finol

customer_reviews.title: I loved exploring the Indonesian islands
customer_reviews.text: How can I contribute in a way that others have not? Far Cry 3 is an amazing world. While I didn't care too much for the story, I loved the setpiece moments, the gunplay, the hunting, and the exploration. The graphics are wonderful as you explore the Indonesian island. I eagerly anticipate Far Cry 4.
customer_reviews.author: JensenAndMore

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite game!
customer_reviews.text: With all the new titles coming out Far Cry 3 lives up to the Hype! This has become my favorite game by far. The open world and the unique crafting areas are amazing. There always seems to be a new side quest or mission to go on, and the DLC is worth the money, Hurk is hilarious! Well worth the money. Not many games are these days but the time in and the replay ability make far cry 3 the game of the year , IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: D.Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Hardly Ever Write a Review
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I just had to let everyone know how amazing and immersive this game was. I usually get bored of a game after playing for a an hour or so, but I couldn't put this game down. I completed and got 850 achievement points with this game in about 20 hours. The graphic, sound, story, and gameplay was very fun. If you are still undecided, at least rent it to see what you think of the game. I am sure most of you will buy it after trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly huge game.
customer_reviews.text: Was slow to get started but once you are into the game there is so much to do,side missions,weapons to buy,items to make,abilities to learn and hone,and just when u think the story is getting close to the finish,then comes the second half. Totally engaging,lots of weapons to modify,items to build and use. If you like a massive game,like the assassins creed series and crysis,then you will have a blast with this work of art since it is even bigger. Have fun people!
customer_reviews.author: rshack

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected and then some
customer_reviews.text: Cons -No Mission Replay mode for those who wanna replay certain missions -Even if you get the biggest wallet you can still only carry $10000 which trust me will fill up very quickly Pros -Great Characters -Interesting Story -Good AI -Environments and visuals are amazing -Easy to get money -Combat is very solid and enjoyable -The different things to do in the game keeps gameplay from becoming too repetitive This game is great and I have very little to complain about. If you like free roaming type games similar to Skyrim and Fallout 3 then I recommend you buy this game. You will most likely enjoy it and think its money well spent
customer_reviews.author: King Cobra

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome, but not as awesome as Tomb Raider.
customer_reviews.text: My friend was telling me to get this game cause it was action packed, had a great story line, and a ton of customization. Also the scenery looks pretty nice. But compared to the Tomb Raider reboot of I think 2013, it's not as good. This game requires a lot of running, swimming, & driving around which can get boring. The Tomb Raider game has a way better scenery, constant action, and also a ton of customization. It's a nice game, just not as good as the Tomb Raider Reboot.
customer_reviews.author: William Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: My favorite game
customer_reviews.text: I don't play online and this is my favorite game ever. It's open and you can go wherever you want. Lots of maps, challenges, weapons and bad guys. However, after playing it through once I started over with the intent of completing more challenges. It has a glitch when it's time to burn the crops. It's well documented and a tremendous fail.
customer_reviews.author: Turnone2000

customer_reviews.title: Great Game 2012
customer_reviews.text: This game creates an open world where you can use stealth, run & gun, or snipe from afar, but the plot driven experiences are the best aspect in my opinion. I found the game to be fun, with great scenes and a great feeling of adventure. The side missions are repetitive but the world is huge and engulfing. The graphics are good, the video graphics are great; Keeping you in the same world and same look but giving great performaces of facial expressions and feelings. The main antagonist Vaas, who you meet early on, is great and makes the game worth every penny. This or Xcom for game of the year 2012.
customer_reviews.author: NiceStuff

customer_reviews.title: At first I got it because a friend had it...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mostly because it was half-off and worth the money. For the most part the single player is solid. Good gameplay, but after a while the story seemed a little forced. I won't go into details, but there were certain points in the game that I felt like the protagonist's character development didn't make sense and after a while the story became very odd. All in all it was a good game and worth a look at, but I wasn't complaining when the story ended. Good gameplay, okay story, good graphics, and good voice acting. Like I said worth a buy because it is fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Received as described
customer_reviews.text: I don’t play it but never heard any complaints from the kids
customer_reviews.author: BritneyG

customer_reviews.title: Rule the Island!
customer_reviews.text: Great story! Not the greatest game of all time, but deserves a chance to exceed your expectations. Will make you feel as if you are just trying to survive whatever the island has to throw at you.
customer_reviews.author: EpicMD

customer_reviews.title: Holy Crap this Game is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that could make this game awesomer would be: Zombies, Dinosaurs, and/or helicopter gunships you can pilot at will. I'd love to see Monster Download Packs. So I could hunt werewolves, Unicorns or whatever on the island. A great game, absolutely worth the $20 I got it for on sale. Ubisoft, I totally forgive you for Far Cry 2 now.
customer_reviews.author: C.E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been so excited or invested in a game since the Bioshock and Fallout series. The environment is beautiful and genuinely fun to explore, the enemies and animals challenging, and the missions themselves are vast. My only issue is the way some of the voice acting sounds a little filtered or muffled, but those are only around the NPCs. I recommend this game for anyone that enjoys shooters but also likes to take some time off and just explore. The multiplayer and co-op story modes are fun as well, though the former does resemble COD a bit (as do most FPS multiplayer games now). 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Medina

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that if you like open world/survivor games this is the one
customer_reviews.text: I am a ubisoft die hard fan so it is only normal that i got this game. I never played the past Far Cry games so I didnt know what I was going to get. I have to say that if you like open world/survivor games this is the one. So much to do its amazing looking forward to Far Cry 4!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is truly excellent. A first person shooter in an open world (which is very well done and beautiful) with elements of exploration, hunting and driving. My favorite part is that this game allows you to approach missions and other elements of the game in various different ways. It allows a lot of creativity on the gamer's part. You can approach missions in a very stealthy manner or in a more confrontational and action oriented way. It's a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Knaak

customer_reviews.title: ... get this game it is very glitchy but it’s fun to play
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this game it is very glitchy but it’s fun to play. It does not save.
customer_reviews.author: bugsinlove

customer_reviews.title: This game is sick!
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome! Great mix of action and sneaking, hunting, all with a good story line. The achievements are actually achievable, which is hard to say for a lot of games. The co-op was tough but a lot of fun. I definitely recommend this to anyone who follows the series or just enjoys first person shooters!
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I have ever played. The guns, story, graphics, missions and side quests were all fantastic. Great work from UbiSoft, and I hope their next versions are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: John Scout

customer_reviews.title: Really fun, but I think I played it too much ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is too long. I know, too much value for the buck, and I'm complaining. But seriously, I thought I had almost finished it and then got to a new island and realized I was only halfway through. Really fun, but I think I played it too much when I first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M

customer_reviews.title: Meh Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had a lot of hype and friends were going to be playing it. Granted it is a lot more fun when you have your friends play it - big open world, lots of quests, and a main story to follow just like all of the other ones. Other then that it gets old quickly and solo play is repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: FAR CRY 3
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Not many games like this anymore where they just throw you in a world and let you do just about anything you want. It's really fun and if you like FPS games, sandbox games, or both, then it's definitely for you. Only complaint I have is the extremely, unnecessary large amount of cursing and use of drugs within the game. Also sex scene was not necessary to include, but at least you can just skip that part.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mikhailenko

customer_reviews.title: Fantasticsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, it is one of the best games of the year. It has amazing graphics followed by an amazing storyline. You get to really know the characters and it becomes one of those games that you become sucked into. The free roam in this game is also great and I have countless hours just running or driving around the map. I would totally recommend this game to anyone who is a fan of sandbox type games with a priceless storyline.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Walk

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Played through twice. Not for kids, and not only because of language, but content as well. Graphics are beautiful. Spent hours outside of the original game play discovering the beauty of the island. Lots of hunting, animal and human. Go through blow and go or sniping. Lots of fun. Can't wait for the next!
customer_reviews.author: The Tam'ster

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This game is unbelievable. Incredibly fast-paced, plays like a movie, excellent control, excellent graphics, excellent sound, excellent story. The single player storyline took a long time to beat and I still play it occasionally to "retake" the enemy-held outposts. It is one of the best games on Xbox 360 and one of my all-time favorites. I haven't tried the multiplayer very much to be able to comment on that. Even without it, the game would be phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: manofsteelmike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: For those of you that love Fps games, this one is a must have. Kill animals to make items to use that are helpful. For example be able to carry more guns and ammunition. I like to run around and hunt but it gets boring after a while with repeated steps. Character voices are amazing and the killings are crazy at times. Still playing the game. Shipped super fast and on the time that was expected of. I was skeptical at first but after I got the game I was ecstatic about it. Great buy and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tobivil

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games I've ever played..
customer_reviews.text: I normally just play games like COD and NBA 2k because I like to play online with my friends but this game was awesome. It's realistic and plays out like a movie and you could play it over and over because of the open world and different ways to do things. Would definitely recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jhern

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the top 10 xbox 360 games, hands down. There's not a bad thing about it. The single player is huge. I got all 1000 achievements in this game, and it only took me 2 wonderful weeks. What a pleasure it is to play. Best far cry game, and certainly one you should own. BUY IT ALREADY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my gamer in the house. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gamer in the house. She absolutely loves it. Though, there was some confusion at the start... with the online choices and functions. It took her a while to figure out how to get 'single player' mode. The makers need to include so directions on this product.
customer_reviews.author: music gal

customer_reviews.title: What a game, absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the type of game that you can play over and over again. A ton of content, ziplines, air gliding, vehicles, hunting and crafting (skin animals, pick herbs to make potions), AI is great, if you like to be stealthy this game will be fun for you. You don't have to grind to get good weapons either. Keep it up devs!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Great Adventure Game
customer_reviews.text: Great adventure game. Makes Far Cry 2 look very redundant and boring in comparison to the variety of game play offered in Far Cry 3. Can be a little difficult for the novice during the first few hours of game play. There is the ever present threat of rebels and wildlife keeping you on your toes, but once you liberate a few radio towers you can ease up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Do not pass up
customer_reviews.text: First of all ill say i have never played much of any of the other Far Crys. Whether u need to or not i really dont think so. I am a huge RPG fan and ubisoft fan so i thiught why not because it was the Gold Box deal. And it was definitly worth it. Very solid storyline and very entertaining quests/side quests as well as challenging. If i knew it was going to be this good i wouldve preordered it. Will not dissapoint
customer_reviews.author: Jamesray

customer_reviews.title: FPS is my family's favorite type of game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has played this thru once already and she's playing it again. She showed me last night how she could sneak up on someone and kill them "Jack Bauer style" (up close and personal) so she saves on ammo. Great weapons to choose from. My husband said she'll have to teach him how to play it because he just doesn't "get it."
customer_reviews.author: Blanche L. Gordan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely in my top 10 of games
customer_reviews.text: My top ten is pretty hard to get into considering that I've only met about 4 games that meet the criteria. This game is VAST and is a new experience every time I play it. This game kept me occupied for about 4-5 weeks before I replayed it. After you beat the game you can still clear out outposts that you didn't before. I only wish that this game had more things to do and was more open world. The gameplay itself isn't restricting, but facets of it are. I can't describe this game, I love it so much. The ending was somewhat pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: A book afficionado

customer_reviews.title: Seriously fun
customer_reviews.text: I like stealth games and adventure games and role-playing games, and this one represents the best of all three - plus it's set in an "open sandbox world" on a beautiful tropical island. Incredibly fun once you master the controls. I highly recommend for the 30-40 year-old crowd.
customer_reviews.author: HamBone

customer_reviews.title: vast
customer_reviews.text: Hours upon hours of gameplay. The world is so incredibly vast, its huge! And able to travel anywhere with so many options of transportation. Only held back from entering all buildings with doors. Only selected buildings permitted. And difficulty level is somewhat inconsistant. But still tons of fun without a doubt. Main mission gets more and more interesting as you go. There are also tons of side mission also. Also its great to just go mess around the world doing whatever you feel like. Maybe the best open world shooter games I've played.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

product_meta.title: Far Cry 3
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox 360| Edition:Standard

JOURNEY INTO THE HEART OF INSANITY
Far Cry 3 is an open world first-person shooter set on an island unlike any other. A place where heavily armed warlords traffic in slaves. Where outsiders are hunted for ransom. And as you embark on a desperate quest to rescue your friends, you realize that the only way to escape this darkness…is to embrace it.

KEY GAME FEATURES
AN OPEN WORLD FIRST-PERSON SHOOTER
Create your own FPS adventure. Customize your weapons, your skills and your approach to each mission, whether you favor intense run-and-gun action, stealthy close-up takedowns or long-range sniping.

AN ISLAND OF DANGER AND DISCOVERY
Explore a diverse island playground, from mountain ranges and swampy grasslands to white sandy beaches. Discover relics, hunt exotic animals, play mini-games and travel quickly by land, sea or air. Fight your way through the island’s towns, temples, river ports and more!

UNCOVER A MEMORABLE STORY AND AN INSANE CAST OF CHARACTERS
Encounter an engaging and disturbed cast of characters as you take a gritty journey to the dark side of humanity, written by a Writers Guild Award winner.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS IN A FULL CO-OP CAMPAIGN
Play online or split screen and team up in a four-player campaign which challenges you to be your best and work together to prevail. Experience the island through the eyes of a wayward crew in their own quest to survive against the odds.

A DIFFERENT BREED OF MULTIPLAYER
Innovative multiplayer rewards skill and team play. To level up, players must support each other by boosting with battle cries, reviving teammates and calling in support weapons. After each match, players have the choice to punish or show mercy for their foes in fun and twisted ways, choreographed with interactive cutscenes.

USE THE MAP EDITOR TO CREATE AND ACCESS NEW CONTENT
The powerful and easy-to-use Far Cry Map Editor is back, with new and improved features. A community of mapmakers ensures a constant stream of all-new content with the very best being showcased for the whole world to enjoy. Using the included tools, you too can make amazing maps, quickly and easily.

CUTTING-EDGE GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY
Far Cry 3 is being developed by the world-class game designers who brought you such critically acclaimed titles as Assassin’s Creed 2, Assassin’s Creed Brotherhood, and World in Conflict.
